shared.model
Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
  shared.model.UserManager

public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object

UserManger class manages the users and can change the player list, tell whose turn it is, and cycle through turns

Author:
thyer

Constructor Summary
UserManager()
           
 
Method Summary
 void addUser(User newPlayer)
          Calls canAddUser, if that returns true, adds the new user to the player list
 boolean canAddUser(User newPlayer)
          Checks to see if the Player looks okay and if the list is sufficiently small.
 void cycleTurn()
          Changes the current player to the next one in the list (or the first player if the end is reached).
 User getCurrentPlayer()
           
 void removePlayer(User toBeRemovedPlayer)
          Removes a given player from the list (not sure if we'd need this)

Method Detail

addUser

public void addUser(User newPlayer)
Calls canAddUser, if that returns true, adds the new user to the player list

Parameters:
newPlayer - the player to be added

canAddUser

public boolean canAddUser(User newPlayer)
Checks to see if the Player looks okay and if the list is sufficiently small.

Parameters:
newPlayer -
Returns:
true if the player can be added, false otherwise

cycleTurn

public void cycleTurn()
Changes the current player to the next one in the list (or the first player if the end is reached). Updates the currentPlayer and currentPlayerIndex

public User getCurrentPlayer()
